entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
